name: Cars vs Zombies
description:
You are in a post-apocalyptic world fighting hordes of zombies. You only have your car, you and it are one. Your only goal is to survive. Configure your car before the battle, choose a car model and a weapon model. Each weapon has its own pros and cons. Play all kinds of options. Check how many waves of zombies you can repel.
Features:
Defend the city from waves of zombies
-Configure your car
-Track your health
-Learn the waves
